title: Spicy lamb and sultana stuffed onions
ingredients: ['8 large Spanish onions, about 2kg in total', '4 tbsp sultanas', '4 tbsp bulghur wheat', '3 garlic cloves', '1 tbsp olive oil', '400g lean minced lamb', '2 tsp ground cumin', '½ tsp ground cinnamon', '1 tsp ground coriander', '¼ tsp cayenne pepper']
